description: NBC’s The Voice gives Alexa all the information she needs to keep you up to date on the immensely popular musical competition series, The Voice! Listen to recaps of every episode, learn more about the artists on your favorite coach’s team and more. Check back after every episode for something new!
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask The Voice who is on Team Adam?
Alexa, ask The Voice what happened on last night's episode?
name: The Voice
shortDescription: Go inside NBC’s immensely popular musical competition series, The Voice! Get the latest show recaps and learn more about your favorite coaches and artists!
